article.title: Raytheon to Provide Friend or Foe Identification for Missile Defense
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Network Centric Systems, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, was awarded a $75 million firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of the AN/TPX-57 Identification Friend or Foe Systems Air Defense Interrogators components and associated engineering support.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Fort Monmouth, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
